documentList.marketingProductName: Z9D 4K HDR with Android TV
documentList.longMarketingProductName: Z9D | LED | 4K Ultra HD | High Dynamic Range (HDR) | Smart TV (Android TV™)
documentList.longDescription: Experience the most stunning picture with the ZD9 4K HDR Android TV, featuring the 4K HDR Processor X1 Extreme and the LED Backlight Master Drive. Explore here.
topFeatures: 4K HDR Processor X1 Extreme for ultimate realism
Unprecedented contrast with Backlight Master Drive
Amazing contrast with X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO
Wide colour gamut with TRILUMINOS Display
ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.
featureBenefits: Backlight Master Drive™

|| The Backlight Master Drive™ is a full-array LED backlight technology that combines an ultra-dense LED structure, a spectacular algorithm and a completely new optical design. Powered by the 4K HDR Processor™ X1 Extreme, this technology delivers incredibly deep black, dazzling lights and more vibrant colour.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/93abebedf98605e91d91881c4e04ed8f?fmt=jpeg
4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme: So real you can feel it

|| Made to enhance the latest generation of 4K HDR pictures, the 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme brings reality to every scene. With 40% more real-time image processing than our renowned 4K Processor X1™, it delivers unprecedented picture quality for everything you watch, upscaling content from any source nearer to 4K HDR quality.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a68eed5e04bbdbea2da587cc974cc161?fmt=jpeg
Uncover the detail with 4K HDR

|| A High Dynamic Range (HDR) compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that TV has ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/4fd45e3ec09cede1cf537c428165c504?fmt=jpeg
Backlight Master Drive™

|| The Backlight Master Drive™ is a backlight technology that combines an ultra-dense LED structure, a spectacular algorithm and a completely new optical design. Powered by the 4K HDR Processor™ X1 Extreme, this technology delivers incredibly deep black, dazzling lights and more vibrant colour than you've ever seen on the big screen.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f6cf5e03ee280b7450a5530f9c24fed2?fmt=jpeg
TRILUMINOS™ Display: Extra colours, extra brilliance

|| More colours means more realism. A TRILUMINOS™ Display with its specially-developed backlight selectively maps colours across a wider gamut, ensuring subtle colours do not become oversaturated and unnatural. You'll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/79c6cebfffa2ff6ab89719259763642e?fmt=jpeg
Dual database processing

|| The 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme has two imaging databases that work together in real time to improve your picture. By searching through thousands of picture patterns in Sony-exclusive databases for noise reduction and super-resolution, they remove unwanted noise and upscale every image to the clarity of 4K, so you can enjoy incredible picture quality no matter the source.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d6fec408511bde3ef920d985a9acf032?fmt=jpeg
Explore new worlds with Android TV™

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Enjoy many of your favourite smartphone and tablet experiences on a big, beautiful BRAVIA™ screen. Android TV™ with advanced voice control lets you connect and access content, from movies and TV shows to thousands of apps, simply by talking.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d1f784becc5611ca2f7913bcbe73ea3e?fmt=jpeg
This TV is recommended by Netflix

|| Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. A Netflix Recommended TV is chosen for its high performance, cutting-edge smart features and easy app access. You can also watch Marco Polo in 4K HDR today, with a premium Netflix subscription. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/440700d76da976168b2dd9a6ae52d86b?fmt=jpeg
Premium gold finish

|| The sophisticated aluminium bezel is finished with a strip of gold finish for a refined look that gives a premium feel to any space. The pale gold colour sits perfectly alongside your furniture for an elegant viewing experience.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/804fdf8f15f06745b7da5d85f7bf09d5?fmt=jpeg
Clean rear look
|| Keep wires out of sight, thanks to a hidden cable panel structure. All of your cables are fully concealed behind the panel, and run down through the centre of the stand, so everything looks tidy.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/2d304a2cb33ade1f7f5171f1e5af0211?fmt=jpeg
Easy to plug and play
|| Easily connect a USB or HDMI into the side of your TV to start playing. Just close the side cover to keep things tidy when you're not using it.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b9f45a0d005206bcf9fd44ca0767faf3?fmt=jpeg
Cable-free front
|| All of your cables can be neatly arranged across the back of the TV and channelled into the stand, so there are no wires visible from the front.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/818fc0ef8e063ec5a89ef4d366bf394d?fmt=jpeg
Super slim flush surface display
|| The screen on this ultra-thin 4K HDR TV has a full flush surface and super-thin bezel so you stay focused on the picture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/c52024ebe71c293e6352219289b2036c?fmt=jpeg
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth

|| Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/69b98bb59b8f696e08e788851ca68c17?fmt=jpeg
Backlight Master Drive™: Calibrated beam LED design

|| The Backlight Master Drive™ has a new optical LED design which keeps light only where it's needed in each scene. By gathering light more effectively, the design reduces diffusion and the flare effect that might be seen on other full-array TVs, for greater brightness and more accurate contrast than ever before.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e3029ebca9d72560281d85575a51d4b5?fmt=jpeg
Object-based HDR remaster

|| By analyzing the objects in each scene individually, Object-based HDR remaster optimizes and enhances colour and contrast. It brings everything you watch closer to the quality of HDR. Dark elements get darker, bright elements brighter and everything in between is more accurately lit, for never-before-possible realism in every scene.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3b73d11ea246bb0c06a84efa1dd7f40d?fmt=jpeg
Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR

|| Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR creates a smoother, more natural picture by minimizing its colour banding. With 14-bit powerful signal processing, it breaks up the solid bands of colour of an 8-bit or 10-bit source, up-converting to 14-bit equivalent gradation, with 64 times more colour levels. It delivers graceful reproduction of faces, sunsets and other areas of subtle colour gradation.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a3114947986d5bf6d790ccf3886a105d?fmt=jpeg
Dual database processing

|| The 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme has two imaging databases that work together in real time to improve your picture. By searching through thousands of picture patterns in Sony-exclusive databases for noise reduction and super-resolution, they remove unwanted noise and upscale every image to the clarity of 4K, so you can enjoy incredible picture quality no matter the source.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/dcb41d373835e9a9c7b5b8c42edffa2a?fmt=jpeg
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for "romantic comedies", for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ba034edb59b5194afa7385f161208a8f?fmt=jpeg
Content Bar: Find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3bd20dd80bd10ef29c60448bc464762a?fmt=png-alpha
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ or Netflix from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android™, iOS™ or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=jpeg
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f4d3f43a04480099dd9b55b6ce6e299a?fmt=jpeg
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f7d3418891d4f8f337c992ba27916811?fmt=jpeg
DSEE restores detail to your digital music

|| Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/640aae2ff025ae44a1aa4f3e839ae312?fmt=jpeg
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| BRAVIA™ uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by 'sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d136a6a3644b8bf260ac587e38521d9d?fmt=jpeg
Cinematic S-Force Front Surround

|| Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/9b2924f3fbefbfe19257c6ed16ff1647?fmt=jpeg
Turn your TV into a digital recorder: USB HDD REC

|| Store your favourite TV shows on an external USB hard disk drive to enjoy whenever you want. USB HDD REC allows one-touch and timer recording of a digital broadcast onto any USB HDD device up to 2 TB in capacity. While viewing the show, simply press REC to start recording, which will automatically stop at the end of the programme.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a5aec82b14bd1e35fc3fe3ae458b56d7?fmt=jpeg
IR Blaster: Control everything with one remote
|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e3ec9771c78f941341a4b8520507a19d?fmt=jpeg
YouView: The best of catch-up and on-demand TV

|| With YouView built-in, you can scroll back up to seven days to watch shows from catch-up TV services. You can also access an extensive library of on-demand content. Simply connect your BRAVIA™ to an aerial and broadband connection to get started with YouView.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d2635895135a0b6d60c0d19c91e70112?fmt=jpeg
Enjoy HDR gaming with PlayStation®

|| Sony 4K HDR televisions are perfect partners for PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®4 Pro consoles. Immerse yourself in a responsive, fun-filled gaming experience with vivid textures and intensely vibrant colours. See your favourite games come to life with the incredible picture quality.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a034ae3494e799f96d98c4f450f47808?fmt=jpeg

While viewing the show, simply press REC to start recording, which will automatically stop at the end of the programme.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a5aec82b14bd1e35fc3fe3ae458b56d7?fmt=jpeg, IR Blaster: Control everything with one remote,  || The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e3ec9771c78f941341a4b8520507a19d?fmt=jpeg, YouView: The best of catch-up and on-demand TV,  || With YouView built-in, you can scroll back up to seven days to watch shows from catch-up TV services. You can also access an extensive library of on-demand content. Simply connect your BRAVIA™ to an aerial and broadband connection to get started with YouView.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d2635895135a0b6d60c0d19c91e70112?fmt=jpeg, Enjoy HDR gaming with PlayStation®,  || Sony 4K HDR televisions are perfect partners for PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®4 Pro consoles. Immerse yourself in a responsive, fun-filled gaming experience with vivid textures and intensely vibrant colours. See your favourite games come to life with the incredible picture quality.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a034ae3494e799f96d98c4f450f47808?fmt=jpeg], factualShortDescription= 4K Ultra HD TV with 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme and Backlight Master Drive™, elevatorPitch= Discover a picture unlike any other in 4K HDR with ultra-contrast., mainProductType= television, tvFeatures= [4K HDR Processor X1 Extreme, X-tended dynamic range, TRILUMINOS display, X-Reality PRO], televisionScreenSize= 154+ cm (61+), tvType= [LED, 4K HDR TVs, 4K Ultra HD, Android TV, Smart TV, High Dynamic Range (HDR), Netflix Recommended TV, stand4k], inTheBox= [Analogue Extension Cable, Voice Remote Control type (RMFTX201P), 3D Glasses x 2pcs (TDG-BT400A), Batteries, AC Power Cord, IR Blaster, Operating Instructions, Quick Setup Guide, Table Top Stand (separate assembly required))], envStatement= null, envLink= null, model= null, superModel= null, tvScreenSize= 164 cm (65), productFileName= kd-65z9d-in5.json

documentList.marketingProductName: X93D 4K HDR with Android TV
documentList.longMarketingProductName: X93D | LED | 4K Ultra HD | High Dynamic Range (HDR) | Smart TV (Android TV™)
documentList.longDescription: Thanks to our ingenious Slim Backlight Drive™, this 4K HDR television offers breathtaking picture quality in a super thin design.
topFeatures: Available in 139 cm (55)
Slim Backlight Drive for beautiful design and picture quality
Incredible contrast with X-tended Dynamic Range PRO
ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.
featureBenefits: 4K HDR : the next generation of picture quality

|| A High Dynamic Range (HDR)-compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that TV has ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/fb48ede3e5dce6ace51024b85003ea84?fmt=png-alpha
4K Processor X1™: one chip changes everything

|| Our powerful 4K Processor X1™ brings stunning picture quality to whatever you're watching. Every source is intelligently analysed and enhanced to near 4K resolution, from TV broadcasts, Blu-ray Discs, DVDs, or even 4K internet videos. You'll enjoy incredible 4K images with stunning clarity, more lifelike colours and sparkling contrast.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/287add606dd8a936fb83093a10350d06?fmt=png-alpha
Slim Backlight Drive™ - Achieving picture and design
|| Our unique Slim Backlight Drive delivers astounding image quality from an incredibly slim design.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/8ab262e3854cdc9967fc2c017561f47d?fmt=jpeg
This TV is recommended by Netflix

|| Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. A Netflix Recommended TV is chosen for its high performance, cutting-edge smart features and easy app access. You can also watch Marco Polo in 4K HDR today, with a premium Netflix subscription. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/dc4e2dfa229c923fdbbccac124036594?fmt=png-alpha
TRILUMINOS™ display

|| Unique to Sony, a TRILUMINOS™ Display enriches your viewing experience with a wider palette of colours and more natural shades and hues. A TRILUMINOS Display excels at reproducing reds, greens and blues — colours that are notoriously difficult for TVs to display accurately. It also displays skin tones beautifully, thanks to its extensive colour palette and precise gradation.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e5d3cc331ba08553b9f83631562e009b?fmt=png-alpha
4K X-Reality™ PRO: enhance every picture up to 4K

|| Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity. Every single pixel is enhanced beautifully by our most powerful 4K picture processing technology ever. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d14dbc67cb0e1182a42d74f57aab0fe8?fmt=png-alpha
X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO: backlight brilliance

|| This unique backlighting algorithm faithfully reproduces a far wider brightness range than a conventional LED TV with brighter peaks and deeper, more revealing shadow detail and blacks. When combined with an HDR signal, you’ll experience even greater brilliance in every scene as it increases the quality of HDR with finely-gradated bands of colour and more vibrant colours.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a9dcdf47e854a8341c48f98cb7f85d07?fmt=png-alpha
Immerse yourself in 3D

|| Enjoy compatible Blu-ray movies, TV broadcasts and web videos with finely detailed 3D images. See pictures with a more natural depth of field and immerse yourself in sport, movies and games like never before.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/5e3c4958b37d513bdfba44a679af1bdc?fmt=png-alpha
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth

|| Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1888ff99dad5f8caef4275f123c096de?fmt=png-alpha
Hangs like a picture
|| Hang your TV flat to the wall like a piece of fine art, thanks to a flush wall mount. A unique cooling system pulls air vertically through the TV for reliable operation .
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/22e706f5a0654e70700d37967266e641?fmt=png-alpha
Super slim flush surface display
|| The screen on this ultra-thin 4K HDR TV has a flush finish with no raised bezel for a near-invisible edge.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3ccdd8ef413ccf5066b23d4cabb14ac0?fmt=jpeg
Clean rear look
|| Keep wires out of sight, thanks to a hidden cable panel structure. All of your cables are fully concealed behind the panel, and run down through the centre of the stand, so everything looks tidy.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/8c039e4af15026881a90bb68c4c631d4?fmt=png-alpha
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in-ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android, iOS or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for “romantic comedies” for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b7f8afb4a30c96b6413996d45c5cecab?fmt=png-alpha
BRAVIA meets Android TV

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Think of all the stuff you love doing on your smartphone or tablet, now on the big, beautiful BRAVIA® screen. All-new Sony Android TV lets you connect and enjoy any content, from apps to movies, between different Android devices – the simplest and easiest way ever.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/c2ccb7c259e6662f148185b2ccef4fd6?fmt=png-alpha
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps  on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ff99a6061803cb2e81c740aac582c0b2?fmt=png-alpha
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/0dd2a9ae9d8e43d0053702749bdbc83f?fmt=png-alpha
Cinematic S-Force Front Surround

|| Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3073dc518b51f43fd30141e4c5b00d80?fmt=png-alpha
DSEE restores detail to your digital music

|| Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/307f1218a61b1d1ea98eae387585bca8?fmt=png-alpha
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity.
An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/59ab92d4f6233eed197c8b3c918eed03?fmt=png-alpha
X-Protection PRO: Xtra Protection TV

|| Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity. An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1f24391dbfcc80258fdd82c07d3b09bf?fmt=png-alpha
Content Bar: find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e7cf9e8db967db9b868aced34473f3e7?fmt=jpeg
Notify BRAVIA®: Don’t miss a thing

|| Don’t miss a thing while you’re absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA® app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it’s connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f38fee24655966ae6b49ebb9e64fd71c?fmt=png-alpha
Serial AbTak: never miss a show

|| Watch your favourite TV shows anytime from a wide variety of regional and national channels, with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/6244b8e9872dbebad231a8c8fa319f22?fmt=png-alpha
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote
|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your Set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/74fe7e54095b46b34460e39f947d2ee0?fmt=png-alpha

documentList.marketingProductName: X93D 4K HDR with Android TV
documentList.longMarketingProductName: X93D | LED | 4K Ultra HD | High Dynamic Range (HDR) | Smart TV (Android TV™)
documentList.longDescription: Thanks to our ingenious Slim Backlight Drive™, this 4K HDR television offers breathtaking picture quality in a super thin design.
topFeatures: Available in 164 cm (65)
Slim Backlight Drive for beautiful design and picture quality
Incredible contrast with X-tended Dynamic Range PRO
ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.
featureBenefits: 4K HDR : the next generation of picture quality

|| A High Dynamic Range (HDR)-compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that TV has ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/fb48ede3e5dce6ace51024b85003ea84?fmt=png-alpha
4K Processor X1™: one chip changes everything

|| Our powerful 4K Processor X1™ brings stunning picture quality to whatever you're watching. Every source is intelligently analysed and enhanced to near 4K resolution, from TV broadcasts, Blu-ray Discs, DVDs, or even 4K internet videos. You'll enjoy incredible 4K images with stunning clarity, more lifelike colours and sparkling contrast.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/287add606dd8a936fb83093a10350d06?fmt=png-alpha
Slim Backlight Drive™ - Achieving picture and design
|| Our unique Slim Backlight Drive delivers astounding image quality from an incredibly slim design.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/8ab262e3854cdc9967fc2c017561f47d?fmt=jpeg
This TV is recommended by Netflix

|| Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. A Netflix Recommended TV is chosen for its high performance, cutting-edge smart features and easy app access. You can also watch Marco Polo in 4K HDR today, with a premium Netflix subscription. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/dc4e2dfa229c923fdbbccac124036594?fmt=png-alpha
TRILUMINOS™ display

|| Unique to Sony, a TRILUMINOS™ Display enriches your viewing experience with a wider palette of colours and more natural shades and hues. A TRILUMINOS Display excels at reproducing reds, greens and blues — colours that are notoriously difficult for TVs to display accurately. It also displays skin tones beautifully, thanks to its extensive colour palette and precise gradation.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e5d3cc331ba08553b9f83631562e009b?fmt=png-alpha
4K X-Reality™ PRO: enhance every picture up to 4K

|| Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity. Every single pixel is enhanced beautifully by our most powerful 4K picture processing technology ever. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d14dbc67cb0e1182a42d74f57aab0fe8?fmt=png-alpha
X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO: backlight brilliance

|| This unique backlighting algorithm faithfully reproduces a far wider brightness range than a conventional LED TV with brighter peaks and deeper, more revealing shadow detail and blacks. When combined with an HDR signal, you’ll experience even greater brilliance in every scene as it increases the quality of HDR with finely-gradated bands of colour and more vibrant colours.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a9dcdf47e854a8341c48f98cb7f85d07?fmt=png-alpha
Immerse yourself in 3D

|| Enjoy compatible Blu-ray movies, TV broadcasts and web videos with finely detailed 3D images. See pictures with a more natural depth of field and immerse yourself in sport, movies and games like never before.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/5e3c4958b37d513bdfba44a679af1bdc?fmt=png-alpha
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth

|| Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1888ff99dad5f8caef4275f123c096de?fmt=png-alpha
Hangs like a picture
|| Hang your TV flat to the wall like a piece of fine art, thanks to a flush wall mount. A unique cooling system pulls air vertically through the TV for reliable operation .
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/22e706f5a0654e70700d37967266e641?fmt=png-alpha
Super slim flush surface display
|| The screen on this ultra-thin 4K HDR TV has a flush finish with no raised bezel for a near-invisible edge.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3ccdd8ef413ccf5066b23d4cabb14ac0?fmt=jpeg
Clean rear look
|| Keep wires out of sight, thanks to a hidden cable panel structure. All of your cables are fully concealed behind the panel, and run down through the centre of the stand, so everything looks tidy.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/8c039e4af15026881a90bb68c4c631d4?fmt=png-alpha
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in-ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android, iOS or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for “romantic comedies” for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b7f8afb4a30c96b6413996d45c5cecab?fmt=png-alpha
BRAVIA meets Android TV

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Think of all the stuff you love doing on your smartphone or tablet, now on the big, beautiful BRAVIA® screen. All-new Sony Android TV lets you connect and enjoy any content, from apps to movies, between different Android devices – the simplest and easiest way ever.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/c2ccb7c259e6662f148185b2ccef4fd6?fmt=png-alpha
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps  on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ff99a6061803cb2e81c740aac582c0b2?fmt=png-alpha
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/0dd2a9ae9d8e43d0053702749bdbc83f?fmt=png-alpha
Cinematic S-Force Front Surround

|| Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3073dc518b51f43fd30141e4c5b00d80?fmt=png-alpha
DSEE restores detail to your digital music

|| Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/307f1218a61b1d1ea98eae387585bca8?fmt=png-alpha
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity.
An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/59ab92d4f6233eed197c8b3c918eed03?fmt=png-alpha
X-Protection PRO: Xtra Protection TV

|| Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity. An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1f24391dbfcc80258fdd82c07d3b09bf?fmt=png-alpha
Content Bar: find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e7cf9e8db967db9b868aced34473f3e7?fmt=jpeg
Notify BRAVIA®: Don’t miss a thing

|| Don’t miss a thing while you’re absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA® app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it’s connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f38fee24655966ae6b49ebb9e64fd71c?fmt=png-alpha
Serial AbTak: never miss a show

|| Watch your favourite TV shows anytime from a wide variety of regional and national channels, with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/6244b8e9872dbebad231a8c8fa319f22?fmt=png-alpha
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote
|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your Set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/74fe7e54095b46b34460e39f947d2ee0?fmt=png-alpha

documentList.marketingProductName: X935D 4K HDR with Android TV
documentList.longMarketingProductName: X935D | LED | 4K Ultra HD | High Dynamic Range (HDR) | Smart TV (Android TV™)
documentList.longDescription: The most immersive 4K HDR pictures. The most authentic High-Resolution Audio. Enjoy true-to-life scenes and sounds from a TV that puts you at the heart of the action.
topFeatures: Incredible 4K images with 4K Processor X1
Amazing contrast with X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO
High-Resolution Audio quality
Astounding images with Slim Backlight Drive
ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.
featureBenefits: 4K HDR : the next generation of picture quality

|| A High Dynamic Range (HDR)-compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that TV has ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/fb48ede3e5dce6ace51024b85003ea84?fmt=png-alpha
4K Processor X1™: one chip changes everything

|| Our powerful 4K Processor X1™ brings stunning picture quality to whatever you're watching. Every source is intelligently analysed and enhanced to near 4K resolution, from TV broadcasts, Blu-ray Discs, DVDs, or even 4K internet videos. You'll enjoy incredible 4K images with stunning clarity, more lifelike colours and sparkling contrast.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/287add606dd8a936fb83093a10350d06?fmt=png-alpha
4K X-Reality™ PRO: enhance every picture up to 4K

|| Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity. Every single pixel is enhanced beautifully by our most powerful 4K picture processing technology ever. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d14dbc67cb0e1182a42d74f57aab0fe8?fmt=png-alpha
TRILUMINOS™ display

|| BRAVIA® brings you even more lifelike colour. Because TRILUMINOS selectively maps colours across the wide gamut available thanks to the specially developed backlight, subtle colours do not become oversaturated and unnatural. You'll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e5d3cc331ba08553b9f83631562e009b?fmt=png-alpha
X-tended Dynamic Range™: backlight brilliance

|| This unique backlighting algorithm faithfully reproduces a far wider brightness range than a conventional LED TV with brighter peaks and deeper, more revealing shadow detail and blacks. When combined an HDR signal you’ll experience even greater brilliance in every scene as it increases the quality of HDR with finely-gradated bands of colour and more vibrant colours.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/440ccc700927be6d5fa5be661c006ec8?fmt=png-alpha
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth

|| Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1888ff99dad5f8caef4275f123c096de?fmt=png-alpha
Immerse yourself in 3D

|| Enjoy compatible Blu-ray movies, TV broadcasts and web videos with finely detailed 3D images. See pictures with a more natural depth of field and immerse yourself in sport, movies and games like never before. You can also connect to a 3D Blu-ray Disc™ player and enjoy 2D video upscaled to simulated 3D with enhanced depth and improved on-screen image detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/5e3c4958b37d513bdfba44a679af1bdc?fmt=png-alpha
Wedge form: made for sound

|| Specially shaped to deliver richer, deeper sound from a small footprint, the wedge form is the perfect blend of aesthetics and functional beauty. Slim at the top with a full flush surface, its body is uniquely designed for a large speaker capacity, so you can enjoy enhanced audio from a smaller, more stable footprint.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/16915cfb330510841239027858abba47?fmt=png-alpha
BRAVIA® meets Android TV

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Think of all the stuff you love doing on your smartphone or tablet, now on the big, beautiful BRAVIA® screen. All-new Sony Android TV lets you connect and enjoy any content, from apps to movies, between different Android devices – the simplest and easiest way ever.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/c2ccb7c259e6662f148185b2ccef4fd6?fmt=png-alpha
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps* on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ff99a6061803cb2e81c740aac582c0b2?fmt=png-alpha
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in-ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android, iOS or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for "romantic comedies" for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b7f8afb4a30c96b6413996d45c5cecab?fmt=png-alpha
Content Bar: find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/470bf88fc065263c7f4565c43c8e3283?fmt=jpeg
High-Resolution Audio: upgrade your music life

|| In the recording studio and at live concerts, the master recordings are captured at higher than CD quality. With High-Resolution Audio you can feel the rich sounds as if the artist is performing right in front of you. Upgrade your music life with our High-Resolution Audio TV.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/852cf872857fa563b78642bfb5e1a361?fmt=png-alpha
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/0dd2a9ae9d8e43d0053702749bdbc83f?fmt=png-alpha
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| BRAVIA® uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by ‘sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/59ab92d4f6233eed197c8b3c918eed03?fmt=png-alpha
DSEE HX upscales any source to near High Resolution

|| Our unique DSEE HX upscaling technology expands the bit-depth and range of high frequency signals to near High-Resolution quality. Powerful real-time processing is based on the analysis of various musical sources including Rock, Pop, Jazz and Classical. Even low-quality or compressed audio sources and Internet videos are upscaled to near High Resolution quality.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/519cbb65fadb6e5006e51e212511a1c4?fmt=png-alpha
Cinematic S-Force PRO Front Surround

|| S-Force Front Surround PRO technology processes audio signals using sophisticated delays and phase shifts to create an immersive, finely detailed soundstage that pulls you right into the heart of the action. Direct multi-channel processing ensures a realistically clear and powerful surround sound.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/45278faf474627deb709f2e0850f5615?fmt=png-alpha
Magnetic Fluid Speakers: liquid audio magic

|| Front-facing woofers and subwoofers reproduce clear, powerful full-range sound, with a damperless design that cuts distortion for pure, crisp mids and highs. The advanced Mica-reinforced Glass Fiber material reveals the subtlest musical details — a perfect way to enjoy today's High-Resolution Audio sources.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a520e0089c3841f753318df371e19878?fmt=png-alpha
Serial AbTak: never miss a show

|| Watch your favourite TV shows anytime from a wide variety of regional and national channels, with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/6244b8e9872dbebad231a8c8fa319f22?fmt=png-alpha
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote

|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box). Once connected, you can control your streaming box by using one remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/cfabe9bbaff4d34618a64a55abe10dc2?fmt=jpeg
Notify BRAVIA®: Don’t miss a thing

|| Don’t miss a thing while you’re absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA® app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it’s connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f38fee24655966ae6b49ebb9e64fd71c?fmt=png-alpha
X-Protection PRO: Xtra Protection TV

|| Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity.
An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1f24391dbfcc80258fdd82c07d3b09bf?fmt=png-alpha

documentList.elevatorPitch: Immerse yourself in 4K picture quality and High-Resolution Audio.

High-Resolution Audio quality

ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.
featureBenefits: 4K HDR : the next generation of picture quality

|| A High Dynamic Range (HDR)-compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that TV has ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/fb48ede3e5dce6ace51024b85003ea84?fmt=png-alpha
4K Processor X1™: one chip changes everything

|| Our powerful 4K Processor X1™ brings stunning picture quality to whatever you're watching. Every source is intelligently analysed and enhanced to near 4K resolution, from TV broadcasts, Blu-ray Discs, DVDs, or even 4K internet videos. You'll enjoy incredible 4K images with stunning clarity, more lifelike colours and sparkling contrast.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/287add606dd8a936fb83093a10350d06?fmt=png-alpha
4K X-Reality™ PRO: enhance every picture up to 4K

|| Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity. Every single pixel is enhanced beautifully by our most powerful 4K picture processing technology ever. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d14dbc67cb0e1182a42d74f57aab0fe8?fmt=png-alpha
TRILUMINOS™ display

|| BRAVIA® brings you even more lifelike colour. Because TRILUMINOS selectively maps colours across the wide gamut available thanks to the specially developed backlight, subtle colours do not become oversaturated and unnatural. You'll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e5d3cc331ba08553b9f83631562e009b?fmt=png-alpha
X-tended Dynamic Range™: backlight brilliance

|| This unique backlighting algorithm faithfully reproduces a far wider brightness range than a conventional LED TV with brighter peaks and deeper, more revealing shadow detail and blacks. When combined an HDR signal you’ll experience even greater brilliance in every scene as it increases the quality of HDR with finely-gradated bands of colour and more vibrant colours.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/440ccc700927be6d5fa5be661c006ec8?fmt=png-alpha
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth

|| Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1888ff99dad5f8caef4275f123c096de?fmt=png-alpha
Immerse yourself in 3D

|| Enjoy compatible Blu-ray movies, TV broadcasts and web videos with finely detailed 3D images. See pictures with a more natural depth of field and immerse yourself in sport, movies and games like never before. You can also connect to a 3D Blu-ray Disc™ player and enjoy 2D video upscaled to simulated 3D with enhanced depth and improved on-screen image detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/5e3c4958b37d513bdfba44a679af1bdc?fmt=png-alpha
Wedge form: made for sound

|| Specially shaped to deliver richer, deeper sound from a small footprint, the wedge form is the perfect blend of aesthetics and functional beauty. Slim at the top with a full flush surface, its body is uniquely designed for a large speaker capacity, so you can enjoy enhanced audio from a smaller, more stable footprint.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/16915cfb330510841239027858abba47?fmt=png-alpha
BRAVIA® meets Android TV

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Think of all the stuff you love doing on your smartphone or tablet, now on the big, beautiful BRAVIA® screen. All-new Sony Android TV lets you connect and enjoy any content, from apps to movies, between different Android devices – the simplest and easiest way ever.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/c2ccb7c259e6662f148185b2ccef4fd6?fmt=png-alpha
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps* on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ff99a6061803cb2e81c740aac582c0b2?fmt=png-alpha
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in-ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android, iOS or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for "romantic comedies" for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b7f8afb4a30c96b6413996d45c5cecab?fmt=png-alpha
Content Bar: find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/470bf88fc065263c7f4565c43c8e3283?fmt=jpeg
High-Resolution Audio: upgrade your music life

|| In the recording studio and at live concerts, the master recordings are captured at higher than CD quality. With High-Resolution Audio you can feel the rich sounds as if the artist is performing right in front of you. Upgrade your music life with our High-Resolution Audio TV.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/852cf872857fa563b78642bfb5e1a361?fmt=png-alpha
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/0dd2a9ae9d8e43d0053702749bdbc83f?fmt=png-alpha
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| BRAVIA® uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by ‘sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/59ab92d4f6233eed197c8b3c918eed03?fmt=png-alpha
DSEE HX upscales any source to near High Resolution

|| Our unique DSEE HX upscaling technology expands the bit-depth and range of high frequency signals to near High-Resolution quality. Powerful real-time processing is based on the analysis of various musical sources including Rock, Pop, Jazz and Classical. Even low-quality or compressed audio sources and Internet videos are upscaled to near High Resolution quality.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/519cbb65fadb6e5006e51e212511a1c4?fmt=png-alpha
Cinematic S-Force PRO Front Surround

|| S-Force Front Surround PRO technology processes audio signals using sophisticated delays and phase shifts to create an immersive, finely detailed soundstage that pulls you right into the heart of the action. Direct multi-channel processing ensures a realistically clear and powerful surround sound.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/45278faf474627deb709f2e0850f5615?fmt=png-alpha
Magnetic Fluid Speakers: liquid audio magic

|| Front-facing woofers and subwoofers reproduce clear, powerful full-range sound, with a damperless design that cuts distortion for pure, crisp mids and highs. The advanced Mica-reinforced Glass Fiber material reveals the subtlest musical details — a perfect way to enjoy today's High-Resolution Audio sources.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a520e0089c3841f753318df371e19878?fmt=png-alpha
Serial AbTak: never miss a show

|| Watch your favourite TV shows anytime from a wide variety of regional and national channels, with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/6244b8e9872dbebad231a8c8fa319f22?fmt=png-alpha
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote

|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box). Once connected, you can control your streaming box by using one remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/cfabe9bbaff4d34618a64a55abe10dc2?fmt=jpeg
Notify BRAVIA®: Don’t miss a thing

|| Don’t miss a thing while you’re absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA® app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it’s connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f38fee24655966ae6b49ebb9e64fd71c?fmt=png-alpha
X-Protection PRO: Xtra Protection TV

|| Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity.
An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1f24391dbfcc80258fdd82c07d3b09bf?fmt=png-alpha

|| Keep wires out of sight. All of your cables can be neatly arranged across the back of the TV and channelled into the stand, so everything looks tidy.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/4f55286958638ad59c7aead533bb7a08?fmt=jpeg

It also displays skin tones beautifully, thanks to its extensive colour palette and precise gradation.

It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in-ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android, iOS or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for "romantic comedies" for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b7f8afb4a30c96b6413996d45c5cecab?fmt=png-alpha
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/485f75f7d52c08a052f1bffc0c808b9c?fmt=jpeg
Content Bar: find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content bar and you can keep watching, while you scan through live TV, on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/46b629d07aadbdddc4817c121acf7e12?fmt=jpeg
DSEE restores detail to your digital music

|| Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/307f1218a61b1d1ea98eae387585bca8?fmt=png-alpha
Cinematic S-Force Front Surround

|| Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3073dc518b51f43fd30141e4c5b00d80?fmt=png-alpha
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/0dd2a9ae9d8e43d0053702749bdbc83f?fmt=png-alpha
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| BRAVIA® uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by ‘sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/59ab92d4f6233eed197c8b3c918eed03?fmt=png-alpha
X-Protection PRO: Xtra Protection TV

|| Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity.
An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1f24391dbfcc80258fdd82c07d3b09bf?fmt=png-alpha
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote

|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box). Once connected, you can control your streaming box by using one remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/74fe7e54095b46b34460e39f947d2ee0?fmt=png-alpha
Notify BRAVIA®: Don’t miss a thing

|| Don’t miss a thing while you’re absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA® app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it’s connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f38fee24655966ae6b49ebb9e64fd71c?fmt=png-alpha
Serial AbTak: never miss a show

|| Watch your favourite TV shows anytime from a wide variety of regional and national channels, with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/6244b8e9872dbebad231a8c8fa319f22?fmt=png-alpha
BRAVIA meets Android TV

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Think of all the stuff you love doing on your smartphone or tablet, now on the big, beautiful BRAVIA® screen. All-new Sony Android TV lets you connect and enjoy any content, from apps to movies, between different Android devices – the simplest and easiest way ever.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/c2ccb7c259e6662f148185b2ccef4fd6?fmt=png-alpha

Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps on your TV in a brand new way.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/485f75f7d52c08a052f1bffc0c808b9c?fmt=jpeg, Content Bar: find everything fast,  || The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content bar and you can keep watching, while you scan through live TV, on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first. ,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/46b629d07aadbdddc4817c121acf7e12?fmt=jpeg, DSEE restores detail to your digital music   ,  || Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.  ,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/307f1218a61b1d1ea98eae387585bca8?fmt=png-alpha, Cinematic S-Force Front Surround   ,  || Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3073dc518b51f43fd30141e4c5b00d80?fmt=png-alpha, Made to listen: ClearAudio+   ,  || Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. documentList.marketingProductName: W95D Full HD with Android TV
documentList.longMarketingProductName: W95D | LED | Full HD | Smart TV (Android TV™)
topFeatures: Wide colour gamut with TRILUMINOS Display
Powerful sound with Dual Acoustic Duct Subwoofer
Android TV for movies, games and connectivity
ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.
featureBenefits: Full HD 1080p

|| Experience the detail of Full HD 1080p across all your entertainment. From Blu-ray Discs™ to catch-up TV to smartphone photos, you can see it all in perfect clarity on the big screen with this BRAVIA® TV.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/475849b14a175f01863802ef559a2d99?fmt=jpeg
TRILUMINOS™ display

|| BRAVIA® brings you even more lifelike colour. Because a TRILUMINOS Display selectively maps colours across the wide gamut available thanks to the specially-developed backlight, subtle colours do not become oversaturated and unnatural. You'll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e5d3cc331ba08553b9f83631562e009b?fmt=png-alpha
X-Reality PRO™: a cleaner, more refined picture

|| Enjoy outstanding clarity, sharpness and picture quality for everything you watch. Our combination of noise reduction technologies sharpen and remove noise from every scene, so the picture gleams with clear detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/2b4c22e616f748b8edb072bb9aa93075?fmt=png-alpha
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth

|| Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1888ff99dad5f8caef4275f123c096de?fmt=png-alpha
Immerse yourself in 3D

|| Enjoy compatible Blu-ray movies, TV broadcasts and web videos with finely detailed 3D images. See pictures with a more natural depth of field and immerse yourself in sport, movies and games like never before.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/5e3c4958b37d513bdfba44a679af1bdc?fmt=png-alpha
Slim look

|| Slimline styling blends effortlessly into a living room, enabling easier mounting on a wall. The screen has a narrow frame, accented with aluminium and minimal bezels, so you can focus on your entertainment with near edge-to-edge pictures. It's an ideal blend of form and function for an immersive entertainment experience.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3a9f119bd34077238d0392799c7abb33?fmt=jpeg
Speaker stand
|| As well as providing deeper bass sound, the subwoofer doubles up as a strong, stable stand for your TV.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/37552680145d5d20b65b86384ac2cf51?fmt=jpeg
BRAVIA® meets Android TV

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Think of all the stuff you love doing on your smartphone or tablet, now on the big, beautiful BRAVIA® screen. All-new Sony Android TV lets you connect and enjoy any content, from apps to movies, between different Android devices – the simplest and easiest way ever.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/c2ccb7c259e6662f148185b2ccef4fd6?fmt=png-alpha
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in-ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android, iOS or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha
Content Bar: find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d0db1c9a3915238ed05634a45e3c2013?fmt=jpeg
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for “romantic comedies” for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b7f8afb4a30c96b6413996d45c5cecab?fmt=png-alpha
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps* on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ff99a6061803cb2e81c740aac582c0b2?fmt=png-alpha
DSEE restores detail to your digital music

|| Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/307f1218a61b1d1ea98eae387585bca8?fmt=png-alpha
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/0dd2a9ae9d8e43d0053702749bdbc83f?fmt=png-alpha
Dual acoustic duct subwoofer: Let everyone hear the fun

|| Fill the room with exciting sound that lets everyone in the room join in the fun. This newly designed, external speaker creates a more satisfying soundtrack for musicals, action movies and more, with clear dialogue joined by solid, satisfying bass you can really feel. The speaker sits behind the TV, or hangs discreetly below when wall-mounted.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/c8435878cd4d894285d6619e894c2a78?fmt=png-alpha
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| BRAVIA® uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by ‘sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/59ab92d4f6233eed197c8b3c918eed03?fmt=png-alpha
Serial AbTak: never miss a show

|| Watch your favourite TV shows anytime from a wide variety of regional and national channels, with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/6244b8e9872dbebad231a8c8fa319f22?fmt=png-alpha
Cinematic S-Force Front Surround

|| Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3073dc518b51f43fd30141e4c5b00d80?fmt=png-alpha
X-Protection PRO: Xtra Protection TV

|| Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity.
An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1f24391dbfcc80258fdd82c07d3b09bf?fmt=png-alpha
Notify BRAVIA®: Don’t miss a thing

|| Don’t miss a thing while you’re absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA® app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it’s connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f38fee24655966ae6b49ebb9e64fd71c?fmt=png-alpha
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote

|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box). Once connected, you can control your streaming box by using one remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/cfabe9bbaff4d34618a64a55abe10dc2?fmt=jpeg

documentList.elevatorPitch: See the vibrant colours of TRILUMINOS on a great-sounding Full HD TV.
