Full specifications available soon., mainCategory= [tv-home-cinema, tvs, televisions], featureIcons= [Available in 164 cm (65), 4K High Dynamic Range, 4K HDR Processor X1™, X-tended Dynamic Range PRO, Android TV™], techSpecs= null, keyTechSpecs= null, topFeatures= [Amazing contrast with X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO, Remarkable realism of 4K HDR Processor X1, Wide colour gamut with TRILUMINOS Display, Android TV for movies, games and connectivity], sunriseDateTime= 1.4948316E12, createdAt= 1.494933305477E12, identifiers_bazaarVoiceExternalId= kd-65x9000e-az1, identifiers_id= urn:sony:product:sku:[sku]kd_65_x9000_e_in5_en_in, ecoFeatures= [Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes., Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness., Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.], imagesPrimaryShot= [//sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f76444d324496feb65ca334e365c3ba3?fmt=png-alpha], imagesProductShot= [//sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/cc73ecd15ca2006ba7f8fe7cb45d0860?fmt=png-alpha, //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/1c4ed6f1f0b2ec4e83b51f051db3b59c?fmt=png-alpha, //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/0c248dd3e5a349a7b13161e1e10f3110?fmt=png-alpha, //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/04cf26cd9d4e3ddc9d5333c3271efe79?fmt=png-alpha, //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b600f7b0e33d071d96fdc17018983d9d?fmt=png-alpha, //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/82960ad177bb8b5d584070811d15ac47?fmt=png-alpha, //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/35f91a6a25ee3dce11cdda36522972c8?fmt=png-alpha], featureBenefits= [Reality revealed with X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO,  || This unique backlighting algorithm faithfully reproduces a far wider brightness range than a conventional LED TV for the most dazzling lights and deepest blacks. When combined with an HDR signal you'll experience even greater brilliance in every scene as it increases the quality of HDR with more vibrant colours.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f6cf5e03ee280b7450a5530f9c24fed2?fmt=png-alpha, 4K HDR Processor X1™: More detail, more natural, more real,  || The 4K HDR Processor X1™ with Object-based HDR remaster and Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR technology gives pure colours at higher brightness levels for truly natural pictures. See everything you watch come to life with greater depth, detail and texture.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/7c9763e1b4e9b27624ffcb846610332e?fmt=png-alpha, Uncover the detail with 4K HDR,  || A High Dynamic Range (HDR) compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that our TVs have ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/4fd45e3ec09cede1cf537c428165c504?fmt=png-alpha, TRILUMINOS™ Display: Extra colours, extra brilliance,  || More colours means more realism. A TRILUMINOS™ Display with its specially-developed backlight selectively maps colours across a wider gamut, ensuring subtle colours do not become oversaturated and unnatural. You'll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene. ,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/79c6cebfffa2ff6ab89719259763642e?fmt=png-alpha, Rediscover every detail with 4K X-Reality™ PRO,  || Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity with every single pixel enhanced beautifully. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d6fec408511bde3ef920d985a9acf032?fmt=png-alpha, Explore new worlds with Android TV™,  || Your smart TV just got smarter. Enjoy many of your favourite smartphone and tablet experiences on a big, beautiful BRAVIA™ screen. Android TV™ with advanced voice control lets you connect and access content, from movies and TV shows to thousands of apps, simply by talking.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d1f784becc5611ca2f7913bcbe73ea3e?fmt=png-alpha, This TV is recommended by Netflix,  || Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. A Netflix Recommended TV is chosen for its high performance, cutting-edge smart features and easy app access. You can also watch Marco Polo in 4K HDR today, with a premium Netflix subscription. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/440700d76da976168b2dd9a6ae52d86b?fmt=png-alpha, Narrow aluminium frame ,  || The narrow aluminium frame helps the TV look slim and attractive, while focusing the eye on the screen for maximum entertainment.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/67416d49332fbac9e4eacaa190209c7a?fmt=png-alpha, Cable management,  || Keep wires out of sight. All of your cables can be neatly arranged across the back of the TV and channelled into the stand, so everything looks tidy.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/8d8c2f988e57d80431e5275f502d15fb?fmt=png-alpha, Cable-free front,  || Hide all your cables from set-top boxes or Blu-ray players within the unique stand.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ab96f19199ce0b929d642360b79ea083?fmt=png-alpha, Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth,  || Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/69b98bb59b8f696e08e788851ca68c17?fmt=png-alpha, Object-based HDR remaster,  || By analysing the objects in each scene individually, Object-based HDR remaster optimises and enhances colour and contrast. It brings everything you watch closer to the quality of HDR. Dark elements get darker, bright elements brighter and everything in between is more accurately lit, for realism in every scene never-before-possible on our TVs.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/126aef0c18313d42addb54e04632853b?fmt=png-alpha, Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR,  || Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR creates a smoother, more natural picture by minimising its colour banding. With 14-bit powerful signal processing, it breaks up the solid bands of colour of an 8-bit or 10-bit source, up-converting to 14-bit equivalent gradation, with 64 times more colour levels. It delivers graceful reproduction of faces, sunsets and other areas of subtle colour gradation,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a3114947986d5bf6d790ccf3886a105d?fmt=png-alpha, Say what you want to see with voice search,  || Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for "romantic comedies", for example, brings up a list of suitable options.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ba034edb59b5194afa7385f161208a8f?fmt=png-alpha, Content Bar: find everything fast,  || The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first. ,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3bd20dd80bd10ef29c60448bc464762a?fmt=png-alpha, Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices,  || BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ or Netflix from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android™, iOS™ or your laptop.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha, Google Play™: A world of content and apps,  || Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps on your TV in a brand new way.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f4d3f43a04480099dd9b55b6ce6e299a?fmt=png-alpha, Made to listen: ClearAudio+,  || Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f7d3418891d4f8f337c992ba27916811?fmt=png-alpha, DSEE restores detail to your digital music,  || Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/640aae2ff025ae44a1aa4f3e839ae312?fmt=png-alpha, Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies,  || BRAVIA™ uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by 'sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d136a6a3644b8bf260ac587e38521d9d?fmt=png-alpha, Cinematic S-Force Front Surround,  || Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/9b2924f3fbefbfe19257c6ed16ff1647?fmt=png-alpha, IR Blaster – control everything with one remote,  || The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e3ec9771c78f941341a4b8520507a19d?fmt=png-alpha, Notify BRAVIA™: Don't miss a thing,  || Don't miss a thing while you're absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA™ app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it's connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/cabf0f5dcdbf3357c63e9063e542a2bc?fmt=png-alpha, Serial AbTak; Never miss a show,  || Watch your favourite TV shows any time from a wide variety of regional and national channels with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/bf89b21413697bce37ab11315a4f91b5?fmt=png-alpha, Enjoy HDR gaming with PlayStation®,  || Sony 4K HDR televisions are perfect partners for PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®4 Pro consoles. Immerse yourself in a responsive, fun-filled gaming experience with vivid textures and intensely vibrant colours. See your favourite games come to life with the incredible picture quality.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a034ae3494e799f96d98c4f450f47808?fmt=jpeg], factualShortDescription= Ultra slim 4K HDR TV with 4K HDR Processor X1™, X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO and TRILUMINOS™ Display., elevatorPitch= See brilliant 4K HDR pictures full of contrast, detail and clarity, all in a beautifully sleek design., mainProductType= television, tvFeatures= [4K HDR Processor X1, X-tended dynamic range, TRILUMINOS display, X-Reality PRO], televisionScreenSize= 154+ cm (61+), tvType= [LED, 4K Ultra HD, Android TV, Smart TV, High Dynamic Range (HDR), stand4k, Netflix Recommended TV], inTheBox= [Table Top Stand, Voice Remote Control, Batteries, IR Blaster, AC Power Adaptor, AC Power Cord, Operating Instructions, Quick Setup Guide], envStatement= null, envLink= null, model= null, superModel= null, tvScreenSize= 164 cm (65), productFileName= kd-65x9000e-az1.json

documentList.marketingProductName: 123 cm (49) Motionflow XR 200 (Native 50 Hz), Black bezel, Silver U Slate stand
documentList.longMarketingProductName: X82E | LED | 4K HDR/Ultra HD | 4 x 4 Sound System | Slim Design
documentList.longDescription: Explore the brilliance of 4K HDR. Colours come to life on this TV with a TRILUMINOS™ Display reproducing every shade and hue for incredible realism. And with a 4 x 4 Sound System, you'll feel immersed in the action thanks to a rich, dynamic soundtrack. Full specifications available soon.
topFeatures: Wide colour gamut with TRILUMINOS Display
Enhanced 4K detail with 4K X-Reality PRO
Android TV for movies, games and connectivity
ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.
featureBenefits: TRILUMINOS™ Display: Extra colours, extra brilliance

|| More colours means more realism. A TRILUMINOS™ Display with its specially-developed backlight selectively maps colours across a wider gamut, ensuring subtle colours do not become oversaturated and unnatural. You'll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/79c6cebfffa2ff6ab89719259763642e?fmt=png-alpha
Rediscover every detail with 4K X-Reality™ PRO

|| Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity with every single pixel enhanced beautifully. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d6fec408511bde3ef920d985a9acf032?fmt=png-alpha
Uncover the detail with 4K HDR

|| A High Dynamic Range (HDR) compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that our TVs have ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/4fd45e3ec09cede1cf537c428165c504?fmt=png-alpha
4 x 4 Sound System

|| Immerse yourself in movies and music. Our new 4 x 4 Sound System includes four speakers, each individually powered by its own amplifier. You'll feel right at the heart of the action with crystal-clear soundtracks and deep bass riffs.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b7b888fc98f25c91375f99c0dab90ce0?fmt=png-alpha
Explore new worlds with Android TV™

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Enjoy many of your favourite smartphone and tablet experiences on a big, beautiful BRAVIA™ screen. Android TV™ with advanced voice control lets you connect and access content, from movies and TV shows to thousands of apps, simply by talking.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d1f784becc5611ca2f7913bcbe73ea3e?fmt=png-alpha
This TV is recommended by Netflix

|| Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. A Netflix Recommended TV is chosen for its high performance, cutting-edge smart features and easy app access. You can also watch Marco Polo in 4K HDR today, with a premium Netflix subscription. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/440700d76da976168b2dd9a6ae52d86b?fmt=png-alpha
Narrow aluminium frame
|| The narrow frame helps the TV look slim and attractive, focusing the eye on the screen for maximum entertainment.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/bf89176160b513477bcfd3aeae5ab856?fmt=png-alpha
Cable management
|| Keep wires out of sight. All of your cables can be neatly arranged across the back of the TV and channelled into the stand, so everything looks tidy.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/fea7f401f249bb91ef9efe8ce30771e9?fmt=png-alpha
Cable-free front
|| Hide all your cables from set-top boxes or Blu-ray players within the unique stand.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9280fece6b822c3d9a7fa8a1bbaf4a5?fmt=png-alpha
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth

|| Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/69b98bb59b8f696e08e788851ca68c17?fmt=png-alpha
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for "romantic comedies", for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ba034edb59b5194afa7385f161208a8f?fmt=png-alpha
Content Bar: find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you're looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3bd20dd80bd10ef29c60448bc464762a?fmt=png-alpha
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ or Netflix from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android™, iOS™ or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f4d3f43a04480099dd9b55b6ce6e299a?fmt=png-alpha
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f7d3418891d4f8f337c992ba27916811?fmt=png-alpha
DSEE restores detail to your digital music

|| Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/640aae2ff025ae44a1aa4f3e839ae312?fmt=png-alpha
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| BRAVIA™ uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by 'sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d136a6a3644b8bf260ac587e38521d9d?fmt=png-alpha
Cinematic S-Force Front Surround

|| Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/9b2924f3fbefbfe19257c6ed16ff1647?fmt=png-alpha
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote
|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e3ec9771c78f941341a4b8520507a19d?fmt=png-alpha
Notify BRAVIA™: Don't miss a thing

|| Don't miss a thing while you're absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA™ app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it's connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/cabf0f5dcdbf3357c63e9063e542a2bc?fmt=png-alpha
Serial AbTak; Never miss a show

|| Watch your favourite TV shows any time from a wide variety of regional and national channels with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/bf89b21413697bce37ab11315a4f91b5?fmt=png-alpha
Enjoy HDR gaming with PlayStation®

|| Sony 4K HDR televisions are perfect partners for PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®4 Pro consoles. Immerse yourself in a responsive, fun-filled gaming experience with vivid textures and intensely vibrant colours. See your favourite games come to life with the incredible picture quality.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a034ae3494e799f96d98c4f450f47808?fmt=jpeg
documentList.factualShortDescription: 4K HDR TV with TRILUMINOS™ Display, 4K X-Reality™ PRO and 4 x 4 Sound System.
documentList.elevatorPitch: Immerse yourself in a great 4K HDR experience with the brilliant colours of a TRILUMINOS™ Display and dynamic 4 x 4 Sound System.

documentList.marketingProductName: 139 cm (55) Motionflow XR 200 (Native 50 Hz), Black bezel, Silver U Slate stand
documentList.longMarketingProductName: X82E | LED | 4K HDR/Ultra HD | 4 x 4 Sound System | Slim Design
documentList.longDescription: Explore the brilliance of 4K HDR. Colours come to life on this TV with a TRILUMINOS™ Display reproducing every shade and hue for incredible realism. And with a 4 x 4 Sound System, you'll feel immersed in the action thanks to a rich, dynamic soundtrack. Full specifications available soon.
topFeatures: Wide colour gamut with TRILUMINOS Display
Enhanced 4K detail with 4K X-Reality PRO
Android TV for movies, games and connectivity
ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.
featureBenefits: TRILUMINOS™ Display: Extra colours, extra brilliance

|| More colours means more realism. A TRILUMINOS™ Display with its specially-developed backlight selectively maps colours across a wider gamut, ensuring subtle colours do not become oversaturated and unnatural. You'll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/79c6cebfffa2ff6ab89719259763642e?fmt=png-alpha
Rediscover every detail with 4K X-Reality™ PRO

|| Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity with every single pixel enhanced beautifully. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d6fec408511bde3ef920d985a9acf032?fmt=png-alpha
Uncover the detail with 4K HDR

|| A High Dynamic Range (HDR) compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that our TVs have ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/4fd45e3ec09cede1cf537c428165c504?fmt=png-alpha
4 x 4 Sound System

|| Immerse yourself in movies and music. Our new 4 x 4 Sound System includes four speakers, each individually powered by its own amplifier. You'll feel right at the heart of the action with crystal-clear soundtracks and deep bass riffs.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/b7b888fc98f25c91375f99c0dab90ce0?fmt=png-alpha
Explore new worlds with Android TV™

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Enjoy many of your favourite smartphone and tablet experiences on a big, beautiful BRAVIA™ screen. Android TV™ with advanced voice control lets you connect and access content, from movies and TV shows to thousands of apps, simply by talking.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d1f784becc5611ca2f7913bcbe73ea3e?fmt=png-alpha
This TV is recommended by Netflix

|| Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. A Netflix Recommended TV is chosen for its high performance, cutting-edge smart features and easy app access. You can also watch Marco Polo in 4K HDR today, with a premium Netflix subscription. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/440700d76da976168b2dd9a6ae52d86b?fmt=png-alpha
Narrow aluminium frame
|| The narrow frame helps the TV look slim and attractive, focusing the eye on the screen for maximum entertainment.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/bf89176160b513477bcfd3aeae5ab856?fmt=png-alpha
Cable management
|| Keep wires out of sight. All of your cables can be neatly arranged across the back of the TV and channelled into the stand, so everything looks tidy.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/fea7f401f249bb91ef9efe8ce30771e9?fmt=png-alpha
Cable-free front
|| Hide all your cables from set-top boxes or Blu-ray players within the unique stand.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9280fece6b822c3d9a7fa8a1bbaf4a5?fmt=png-alpha
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth

|| Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/69b98bb59b8f696e08e788851ca68c17?fmt=png-alpha
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for "romantic comedies", for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ba034edb59b5194afa7385f161208a8f?fmt=png-alpha
Content Bar: find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you're looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3bd20dd80bd10ef29c60448bc464762a?fmt=png-alpha
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ or Netflix from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android™, iOS™ or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f4d3f43a04480099dd9b55b6ce6e299a?fmt=png-alpha
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f7d3418891d4f8f337c992ba27916811?fmt=png-alpha
DSEE restores detail to your digital music

|| Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/640aae2ff025ae44a1aa4f3e839ae312?fmt=png-alpha
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| BRAVIA™ uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by 'sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d136a6a3644b8bf260ac587e38521d9d?fmt=png-alpha
Cinematic S-Force Front Surround

|| Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/9b2924f3fbefbfe19257c6ed16ff1647?fmt=png-alpha
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote
|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e3ec9771c78f941341a4b8520507a19d?fmt=png-alpha
Notify BRAVIA™: Don't miss a thing

|| Don't miss a thing while you're absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA™ app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it's connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/cabf0f5dcdbf3357c63e9063e542a2bc?fmt=png-alpha
Serial AbTak; Never miss a show

|| Watch your favourite TV shows any time from a wide variety of regional and national channels with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/bf89b21413697bce37ab11315a4f91b5?fmt=png-alpha
Enjoy HDR gaming with PlayStation®

|| Sony 4K HDR televisions are perfect partners for PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®4 Pro consoles. Immerse yourself in a responsive, fun-filled gaming experience with vivid textures and intensely vibrant colours. See your favourite games come to life with the incredible picture quality.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a034ae3494e799f96d98c4f450f47808?fmt=jpeg

Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f7d3418891d4f8f337c992ba27916811?fmt=png-alpha, DSEE restores detail to your digital music,  || Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/640aae2ff025ae44a1aa4f3e839ae312?fmt=png-alpha, Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies,  || BRAVIA™ uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by 'sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies. ,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d136a6a3644b8bf260ac587e38521d9d?fmt=png-alpha, Cinematic S-Force Front Surround,  || Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/9b2924f3fbefbfe19257c6ed16ff1647?fmt=png-alpha, IR Blaster – control everything with one remote,  || The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.,  || ,  || //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e3ec9771c78f941341a4b8520507a19d?fmt=png-alpha, Notify BRAVIA™: Don't miss a thing,  || Don't miss a thing while you're absorbed in your favourite show. documentList.marketingProductName: X90E 4K HDR TV with X-tended Dynamic Range PRO
documentList.longMarketingProductName: X90E | LED | 4K Ultra HD | High Dynamic Range (HDR) | Smart TV (Android TV™)
documentList.longDescription: Discover the next level of 4K HDR entertainment with the power of the 4K HDR Processor X1™ and our evolved X-tended Dynamic Range PRO technology for exceptionally high contrast, detail and clarity. All in a beautifully sleek design with a refined aluminium finish. Full specifications available soon.
topFeatures: Amazing contrast with X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO
Remarkable realism of 4K HDR Processor X1
Wide colour gamut with TRILUMINOS Display
Android TV for movies, games and connectivity
ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.
featureBenefits: Reality revealed with X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO

|| This unique backlighting algorithm faithfully reproduces a far wider brightness range than a conventional LED TV for the most dazzling lights and deepest blacks. When combined with an HDR signal you'll experience even greater brilliance in every scene as it increases the quality of HDR with more vibrant colours.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f6cf5e03ee280b7450a5530f9c24fed2?fmt=png-alpha
4K HDR Processor X1™: More detail, more natural, more real

|| The 4K HDR Processor X1™ with Object-based HDR remaster and Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR technology gives pure colours at higher brightness levels for truly natural pictures. See everything you watch come to life with greater depth, detail and texture.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/7c9763e1b4e9b27624ffcb846610332e?fmt=png-alpha
Uncover the detail with 4K HDR

|| A High Dynamic Range (HDR) compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that our TVs have ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/4fd45e3ec09cede1cf537c428165c504?fmt=png-alpha
TRILUMINOS™ Display: Extra colours, extra brilliance

|| More colours means more realism. A TRILUMINOS™ Display with its specially-developed backlight selectively maps colours across a wider gamut, ensuring subtle colours do not become oversaturated and unnatural. You'll enjoy vivid, authentic images that evoke the emotion in every scene.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/79c6cebfffa2ff6ab89719259763642e?fmt=png-alpha
Rediscover every detail with 4K X-Reality™ PRO

|| Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity with every single pixel enhanced beautifully. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d6fec408511bde3ef920d985a9acf032?fmt=png-alpha
Explore new worlds with Android TV™

|| Your smart TV just got smarter. Enjoy many of your favourite smartphone and tablet experiences on a big, beautiful BRAVIA™ screen. Android TV™ with advanced voice control lets you connect and access content, from movies and TV shows to thousands of apps, simply by talking.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d1f784becc5611ca2f7913bcbe73ea3e?fmt=png-alpha
This TV is recommended by Netflix

|| Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. A Netflix Recommended TV is chosen for its high performance, cutting-edge smart features and easy app access. You can also watch Marco Polo in 4K HDR today, with a premium Netflix subscription. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/440700d76da976168b2dd9a6ae52d86b?fmt=png-alpha
Narrow aluminium frame
|| The narrow aluminium frame helps the TV look slim and attractive, while focusing the eye on the screen for maximum entertainment.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/67416d49332fbac9e4eacaa190209c7a?fmt=png-alpha
Cable management
|| Keep wires out of sight. All of your cables can be neatly arranged across the back of the TV and channelled into the stand, so everything looks tidy.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/8d8c2f988e57d80431e5275f502d15fb?fmt=png-alpha
Cable-free front
|| Hide all your cables from set-top boxes or Blu-ray players within the unique stand.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ab96f19199ce0b929d642360b79ea083?fmt=png-alpha
Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth

|| Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/69b98bb59b8f696e08e788851ca68c17?fmt=png-alpha
Object-based HDR remaster

|| By analysing the objects in each scene individually, Object-based HDR remaster optimises and enhances colour and contrast. It brings everything you watch closer to the quality of HDR. Dark elements get darker, bright elements brighter and everything in between is more accurately lit, for realism in every scene never-before-possible on our TVs.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/126aef0c18313d42addb54e04632853b?fmt=png-alpha
Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR

|| Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR creates a smoother, more natural picture by minimising its colour banding. With 14-bit powerful signal processing, it breaks up the solid bands of colour of an 8-bit or 10-bit source, up-converting to 14-bit equivalent gradation, with 64 times more colour levels. It delivers graceful reproduction of faces, sunsets and other areas of subtle colour gradation
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a3114947986d5bf6d790ccf3886a105d?fmt=png-alpha
Say what you want to see with voice search

|| Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for "romantic comedies", for example, brings up a list of suitable options.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/ba034edb59b5194afa7385f161208a8f?fmt=png-alpha
Content Bar: find everything fast

|| The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/3bd20dd80bd10ef29c60448bc464762a?fmt=png-alpha
Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices

|| BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ or Netflix from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android™, iOS™ or your laptop.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e9788aff1f6fdd44b84a87db81b7df9a?fmt=png-alpha
Google Play™: A world of content and apps
|| Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps on your TV in a brand new way.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f4d3f43a04480099dd9b55b6ce6e299a?fmt=png-alpha
Made to listen: ClearAudio+

|| Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/f7d3418891d4f8f337c992ba27916811?fmt=png-alpha
DSEE restores detail to your digital music

|| Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/640aae2ff025ae44a1aa4f3e839ae312?fmt=png-alpha
Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies

|| BRAVIA™ uses a powerful computer model to analyse and compensate for inaccuracies in speaker response. It does this by 'sampling' the speaker frequency with higher precision. This information is fed back to cancel out any peaks or dips in the speaker's natural response – resulting in pure, natural audio with smooth, even reproduction of all frequencies.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/d136a6a3644b8bf260ac587e38521d9d?fmt=png-alpha
Cinematic S-Force Front Surround

|| Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/9b2924f3fbefbfe19257c6ed16ff1647?fmt=png-alpha
IR Blaster – control everything with one remote
|| The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/e3ec9771c78f941341a4b8520507a19d?fmt=png-alpha
Notify BRAVIA™: Don't miss a thing

|| Don't miss a thing while you're absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA™ app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it's connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/cabf0f5dcdbf3357c63e9063e542a2bc?fmt=png-alpha
Serial AbTak; Never miss a show

|| Watch your favourite TV shows any time from a wide variety of regional and national channels with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/bf89b21413697bce37ab11315a4f91b5?fmt=png-alpha
Enjoy HDR gaming with PlayStation®

|| Sony 4K HDR televisions are perfect partners for PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®4 Pro consoles. Immerse yourself in a responsive, fun-filled gaming experience with vivid textures and intensely vibrant colours. See your favourite games come to life with the incredible picture quality.
|| //sonyglobal.scene7.com/is/image/gwtprod/a034ae3494e799f96d98c4f450f47808?fmt=jpeg
